vault_identity_entity.description: Creates an Identity Entity for Vault.

name.description: Name of the identity entity to create.

policies.description: A list of policies to apply to the entity.

metadata.description: A Map of additional metadata to associate with the user.

disabled.description: True/false Is this entity currently disabled. Defaults to `false`

external_policies.description: `false` by default. If set to `true`, this resource will ignore any policies return from Vault or specified in the resource. You can use [`vault_identity_entity_policies`](identity_entity_policies.html
